name: de-ai-google
description: Browser extension that excludes AI results from Google searches by appending -ai to queries

scripts.build:chrome: echo 'Chrome build ready - use current directory'
scripts.build:safari: mkdir -p dist/safari && cp manifest-safari.json dist/safari/manifest.json && cp content-safari.js dist/safari/content-safari.js && cp LICENSE dist/safari/ && cp -r icons dist/safari/

author: Your Name
